detail_desc: Lace bra with underwired, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Lace bra with underwired, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.

Lace and mesh bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes. Medium coverage.
Sleeveless blouse in airy chiffon with a zip at the back of the neck, wrapover front and asymmetric hem.
Pyjama bottoms in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Pyjama bottoms in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Pyjama bottoms in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and a button fly. Two pairs in flannel and one in chambray.

Jacket in windproof, water-repellent breathable functional fabric with closed seams at critical points, a detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Zipped side pockets, long raglan sleeves with inner ribbing and a thumbhole at the cuffs, and reflective details. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Blouse in airy patterned chiffon with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and an asymmetric hem. The blouse is made partly from recycled polyester.
Blouse in airy patterned chiffon with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and an asymmetric hem. The blouse is made partly from recycled polyester.
Mesh briefs with a lined gusset, narrow sides and high cut at the back.
Long-sleeved tops in printed cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved tops in printed cotton jersey.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.

Lightly padded anorak in windproof and water-resistant functional fabric with reflective details. Lined hood, stand-up collar, wind flap with hook-and-loop fasteners and a zip at the top. Zipped Kangaroo pocket and adjustable tabs at the cuffs. Lined.

Padded gilet in woven fabric with a sheen. Appliqué at the top, a lined drawstring hood in sweatshirt fabric and a small, ribbed stand-up collar. Zip down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud and a ribbed hem. Lined.
Joggers in a soft knit with cable-knit sections, an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and wide ribbing at the hems.

Short skirt in a dogtooth-patterned weave with frills at the top, a concealed zip at the back and side pockets. Unlined.
Fully lined shaping swimsuit that holds in and shapes the tummy. Deep opening at the top and ties at the back of the neck.

Chunky-knit jumper in a cotton blend containing glittery threads. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved dress in airy, patterned chiffon with an opening and button at the back of the neck, elasticated seam at the waist and asymmetric skirt. Lined.
Low-rise, ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with front and back pockets, a zip fly and button, and skinny legs with raw-edge hems.

Set with a top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric and jersey leggings. Top with long raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and short slits in the sides. Leggings with an elasticated waist.

Soft, stretch waist bag designed for use when running. Adjustable, elastic strap with a plastic fastener at the back, a taped zip and reflective detail at the front. Size 8x23 cm.
Top in soft slub jersey made from a cotton blend with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a rounded, raw-edge hem with slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Top in soft mesh with frill trims, a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed denim with sparkly stones at the front. High waist, low crotch, button fly and straight legs.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, lacing at the waist and long, wide sleeves.
Top in soft cotton jersey with long sleeves and a press-stud on one shoulder. Slightly longer at the back.
Sleeveless jumpsuit in velour with a stand-up collar with concealed buttons at the back of the neck and a V-neck front and back, seam at the waist, side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Set of six face paint crayons in different colours. Weight 6x2.2 g. Not for children under 3.
5-pocket jeans with a regular waist, button fly and tapered legs with twisted, shaping seams.

Shampoo and shower gel set with a fresh watermelon fragrance. 2x50 ml.
Soft fleece jacket designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and long raglan sleeves. Unlined.

Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey with a gathered frill around the neckline.
Skirt in washed cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, front pockets and a seam with a flounce at the hem.
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in sturdy jersey with a small stand-up collar and visible zip with a pendant at the back. Open section at the waist linked with metal eyelets.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a frill around the neckline and sleeves.

Rain jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with closed seams at critical points. Detachable hood with elasticated sides, a zip down the front and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Reflective details. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Rain jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with closed seams at critical points. Detachable hood with elasticated sides, a zip down the front and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Reflective details. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Rain trousers in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams and adjustable elastic braces with plastic fasteners. Press-studs at the sides, elasticated hems and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Reflective details. Unlined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
